name: LegalDocumentExtractionPrompt
observations: Used for extracting meaningful legal dates and events from documents
Focuses on court dates, deadlines, and significant legal milestones
Categorizes events as completed, pending, or scheduled
Excludes document metadata and technical dates
Returns a default entry if no legal dates found

Full prompt text: Extract ONLY meaningful legal dates and events from the document into a table format in JSON. Focus on actual legal events, court dates, deadlines, and significant milestones. Ignore document metadata.

name: ExtractionResponseFormat
observations: Each entry has date (YYYY-MM-DD), event (description), and status (completed|pending|scheduled)

name: ExtractionValidationRules
observations: Validates date format using YYYY-MM-DD regex
Checks for valid status values: completed, pending, scheduled
Filters out metadata-related content using keyword detection
Ensures all required fields are present
Validates array structure and data types
